original_title: 新任女教師 劇場版 愛してるとか 好きだとか
overview: A forbidden story that a high school girl who died of a female teacher with a wounded heart and her mother is drowned in pleasure within school. Kiyomi Kimura, a new female teacher, is concerned about Naoya Shirota, a student who lost his mother a month ago. I will visit my home to encourage Naoya, but he refuses such maple. [R-15 work]
title: Shinnin Onna Kyoshi
